mapper.select: select tmp.*,ttmp.check_num,tttmp.acc_point,ttttmp.dust,i.att_image from (select member_email,count(*) as total_num from class_members as m left outer join dummy_date as d on d.dummy_date >= start_date and d.dummy_date <= date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') where member_email = #{memberEmail} and set_day & weekday != 0 order by school_id,class_id) as tmp left outer join ( select member_email,count(*) as check_num from class_auth_log where member_email = #{memberEmail} ) as ttmp on tmp.member_email = ttmp.member_email left outer join (select member_email,sum(member_point) as acc_point from members_point where member_email = #{memberEmail}) as tttmp on tmp.member_email = tttmp.member_email left outer join (select member_email,if(dust>=70,'먼지뭉치','먼지') as dust from members_dust where member_email = #{memberEmail}) as ttttmp on tmp.member_email = ttttmp.member_email left outer join members_image as i on tmp.member_email = i.member_email;
